strapiPost.title: Artists 360 Empowers Local Creatives With Over $200k In Grant Funding
strapiPost.content:
Applications opened today for the 2023-2024 cohort of Artists 360, providing professional development opportunities and $214,000 worth of grants to regional artists of all disciplines.

  • Uplifting artists: Partnered with the Mid-America Arts Alliance, Artists 360 seeks to elevate the leading artists of NWA by providing a platform to succeed and grow through funding, professional development, and networking opportunities.
  • Multiple grants: Those who apply will have a chance to receive one of six $1,500 student grants, fourteen $7,500 project grants, five $15,000 Community Activator grants, or the single $25,000 Creative Impact Award.

Applications are open until Jun 28. Join a virtual info session tomorrow at noon to learn more HERE.
